label: Env Eng Principles, Biological
description: Application of principles of biochemistry and microbiology to air and water quality, wastes, and their engineering management; biological mediated changes in water and in domestic and industrial wastewater. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CEE 443.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CEE 443.
